data.title: Past Selection Committee Members
data.meta_description: Our mission is to make the world a better place through the advancement of scientific knowledge.
data.text:
The Foundation is grateful to the senior scientists who have given generously of their time and counsel over the years as members of the Sloan Research Fellowship Selection Committees. The high caliber of fellowship recipients and the continued esteem of the fellowships are largely due to their hard work and keen judgement.

Members marked with an asterisk (*) were themselves recipients of a Sloan Research Fellowship as junior scientists.
